sentence.text: Here we report that positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity-c transcript is expressed in 3.2% of cases in The Cancer Genome Atlas breast cancer cohort evenly between ER-positive and ER-negative cases.

entity.text: positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity

sentence.text: Nevertheless, the ratio of positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity to RANK-c (RANK/RANK-c) is increased in ER-negative breast cancer cell lines compared to ER-positive breast cancer cell lines.

entity.text: positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity

sentence.text: The positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity-c-mediated inhibition of cancer cell aggressiveness and nuclear factor-κB (peripheral nervous system development-κB) activation in breast cancer cells seems to rely on a RANK-c/TNF receptor-associated factor-2 (cellular response to DNA damage stimulus) protein interaction.

entity.text: positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity
cellular response to DNA damage stimulus

sentence.text: Additional protein interaction characterization revealed epidermal growth factor receptor (positive regulation of protein phosphorylation) as a novel interacting partner for positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity-c in breast cancer cells with a negative effect on EGFR phosphorylation and EGF-dependent downstream signaling pathway activation.

entity.text: positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity

sentence.text: Our findings further elucidate the complex molecular biology of the positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activityL/RANK system in breast cancer and provide preliminary data for RANK-c as a possible marker for disease progression and aggressiveness

entity.text: positive regulation of DNA-binding transcription factor activity
